# ğŸš€ Frontend Developer Entry Test

This repository contains the completed **Frontend Developer Entry Test** covering real-world frontend development scenarios.  
ğŸ•’ **Time Limit:** 3 Hours  
ğŸ§  **Focus:** Problem Solving Â· Architecture Â· Performance Â· CSS Â· JavaScript Â· React

---

## ğŸ“Œ Sections Overview

### âœ… Section 1: Critical Thinking & Problem Solving (25 pts)
- ğŸ›  Investigated slow-loading React app using DevTools, Lighthouse, Bundle Analyzer
- ğŸ’¡ Proposed fixes: code splitting, lazy loading, worker threads
- âš™ï¸ Designed frontend architecture for real-time trading platform
  - Used WebSockets for updates
  - State managed with Redux Toolkit/Zustand
  - Optimized for low-bandwidth & high concurrency

---

### ğŸ¨ Section 2: Advanced CSS & Responsive Design (20 pts)
- ğŸ“ Built responsive 1-2-4 column card grid layout
- ğŸ–¼ Maintained 16:9 image aspect ratio
- ğŸ§± Bonus: Masonry-style layout with fallback for IE11
- ğŸ Fixed `sticky`, `flex`, and overflow bugs with full explanation

---

### ğŸ“œ Section 3: JavaScript Deep Dive (25 pts)
- âœ… Implemented `batchProcessor()` with concurrency, retries, error handling
- ğŸ§  Fixed memory leaks in React component (EventSource, Chart.js, intervals)
- ğŸ“‹ Explained event bubbling/capturing in complex DOM listener scenario

---

### âš›ï¸ Section 4: React & Modern Frontend (20 pts)
- ğŸ”„ Created `useAsyncState` hook with retry, loading, race condition handling
- âš¡ Optimized large list rendering (10,000 items)
  - Used virtualization, memoization, filtered only visible content

---

### ğŸ” Section 5: Real-World Scenarios (10 pts)
- ğŸ§© Diagnosed undefined `map()` issue using defensive coding & lifecycle checks
- ğŸŒ Solved cross-browser issues in Safari/Firefox (CSS Grid fallback, polyfills, transpilation)

---

## ğŸ… Bonus Section: Innovation & Leadership
- ğŸ›  Migration strategy from jQuery to React for 50+ pages
- ğŸ¯ Focused on:
  - Page-by-page micro frontend migration
  - Zero downtime deployment
  - Team training & code reviews
